entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
